scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix biblioteca-inteligente-backend" "npm run dev --prefix Biblioteca-Inteligente-Frontend"
scripts.install-all: npm install --prefix biblioteca-inteligente-backend && npm install --prefix Biblioteca-Inteligente-Frontend
scripts.build-and-start: npm run build --prefix Biblioteca-Inteligente-Frontend && concurrently "npm start --prefix biblioteca-inteligente-backend" "npm start --prefix Biblioteca-Inteligente-Frontend"
